page.title: 05WORKING IN THE FIELDS
page.content: My mum,Mrs. Lambert,works in the fields. She does,strawberry,apple, cherry and pear picking. She takes a flask and a big packed lunch.If it rains,she either goes in a big shed or a horse van.In the morning a van comes to pick her up at the bottom of the hill and takes her to the fields. My mum,Mrs. Bing,used to work in the fields.She had to take a packed lunch, for her and the children.She used to string hops and pick apples.A van takes you to and from the fields.The women work up and down the rows while the children either play in the dirt or climb trees. During the holidays the older children help pick the apples and earn some pocket money for themselves.There is so much fruit in our area that lots of it has to be dumped at the end of the season.
